name: 4 Day Inca Trail Trek
description: This is the classic and well known Inca Trail Trek to Machu Picchu with an additional personal porter included in the price. The world-renowned Inca Trail Trek is one of the most famous and demanding hikes in the world. Since the rediscovery of Machu Picchu in 1911, adventurers from all over the globe have come to Peru to experience the rich history and beautiful scenery of the Inca Trail Trek.
